lead_paragraph: Gone are the days in the NHL when high-scoring Wayne Gretzky and Mario Lemieux lit up goaltenders at will.

headline.print_headline: Ovechkin Approaches 500-Goal Milestone in Historic Fashion
headline.main: Ovechkin Approaches 500-Goal Milestone in Historic Fashion
